  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICDOManagedItem<ICDORepository>, ICDORepository, org.eclipse.net4j.util.event.INotifier, org.eclipse.net4j.util.lifecycle.ILifecycle, org.eclipse.net4j.util.lifecycle.ILifecycle.DeferrableActivation

    public class CDORepository
extends CDOManagedItem<ICDORepository>
implements ICDORepository
    Provides access to the underlying CDO repository and manages its lifecycle.
